project_name: AWS Services Architecture Implementation Using Terraform
description: Implemented scalable AWS infrastructure using ECS, EC2, ASG with GPU instances, and ALBs for secure and efficient traffic management. Automated deployment with Terraform.

technologies_used.name: Terraform
technologies_used.description: Used for automating the setup of AWS infrastructure, including ECS services, Auto Scaling, VPC, and ALBs.

technologies_used.name: AWS ECS
technologies_used.description: Managed containerized applications across multiple ECS clusters.

technologies_used.name: AWS EC2
technologies_used.description: Provisioned EC2 instances with GPU for high-performance computing.

technologies_used.name: AWS ALB
technologies_used.description: Used for load balancing between services and ensuring secure HTTPS communication.

infrastructure.name: EC2 Auto Scaling Group with GPU Instances
infrastructure.description: Auto scaling group that uses GPU instances to handle traffic surges.
steps: Configured EC2 Auto Scaling Group with GPU instances.
Set scaling policies based on traffic load.

infrastructure.name: Application Load Balancers
infrastructure.description: Two load balancers to handle secure HTTPS communication and distribute load across services.
steps: Configured the first ALB for HTTPS communication between frontend and backend.
Set up the second ALB to manage other traffic.

infrastructure.name: Terraform Infrastructure as Code
infrastructure.description: Automated the entire infrastructure setup with Terraform.
steps: Used Terraform to configure ECS services, VPC, ALBs, and Auto Scaling Group.

skills_required.name: Auto-Scaling and Load Balancing
skills_required.description: Configuring EC2 Auto Scaling Groups and AWS ALBs for efficient resource management.
